subTitle: Ask us anything about our services and solutions, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: What types of software solutions does Quadrate Tech Solutions offer?
faqs.answer: Quadrate Tech Solutions offers a wide range of software solutions including mobile apps, web-based applications, and enterprise software. We specialize in creating high-class, enterprise-level applications tailored to grow your business.

faqs.question: Can you explain the different ERP packages available?
faqs.answer: We offer three main ERP packages: QTS-ULTIMATE PRO, QTS-ULTIMATE ERP, and QTS-PREMIUM ERP. All packages include features such as Sales and POS, Purchases, Inventory and Stocks, Invoice & Quotation, Expenses, Transfer, Returns, Payment Gateway, HR Management, Reports, and Access Level. You can start for free with any of these packages.

faqs.question: What Customer Relations Manager (CRM) application packages do you provide?
faqs.answer: We offer three CRM packages: STANDARD, PROFESSIONAL, and ENTERPRISE. Each package builds upon the previous one, with ENTERPRISE offering the most advanced features like multi-user portals, AI predictions, data encryption, and multi-language support.

faqs.question: What kind of support can I expect for your software solutions?
faqs.answer: We provide dedicated support through multiple channels. You can reach us via email at support@quadrate.lk for any assistance. Our office hours are Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 05:00 PM.

faqs.question: How current are your software solutions and services?
faqs.answer: We constantly strive to offer modern solutions for growing businesses. Our team of coders, engineers, and co-founders ensures that we create nothing but the best software, incorporating innovative ideas and modern technology.

faqs.question: Does Quadrate Tech Solutions offer services for large-scale business needs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we cater to businesses of all sizes. Our solutions are scalable and can be customized for large-scale business needs. We offer comprehensive services including SEO, design & development, social media marketing, PPC, conversion optimization, and reputation management.
